item.description:
Boston Value Investing Group

We will meet at MIT in Building 9, Room 255. See the interactive campus map here.

We learn from Warren Buffett and Benjamin Graham. We use publicly available financial reports.

We suggest reading these two articles about arbitrage - click here to open them. If you wish to discuss arbitrage, please prepare questions with supporting examples.

The meeting format is as follows:
Austin Sher will analyze the latest SEC financial statements of: Trident Microsystems (TRID)



Feel free to contact the leaders Raimondas ( raimondas@hotmail.com ) or Austin ( axs888@yahoo.com) with questions.

We recommend that you read Security Analysis (1934 edition) by Benjamin Graham. We will discuss this book in a future meeting.
item.name: Boston Value Investing Group
